mean_cn: adj.应负责的，应做解释的；可解释的
mean_en: responsible for your decisions or actions and expected to explain them when you are asked
sentence: They held some out-of-date fish they had eaten accountable for their sickness.
sentence_trans: 他们认为之前吃了不新鲜的鱼是他们难受的原因。
word_etyma: account算账 + able形容词后缀：可…的 → 可找其算账的 → accountable有责任的
